definition: to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore

sentences.english: If pregnant, take an iron supplement, as recommended by an obstetrician or other health care provider.
sentences.chinese: 如懷孕，要在婦產醫生的指導下食用補鐵的食物。

sentences.english: Reduce edible salt bloats, smoke, barbecue food.
sentences.chinese: 減少食用鹽醃，煙燻，燒烤的食物。

sentences.english: Silvereyes are omnivorous but have a particular fondness for fruit.
sentences.chinese: 灰胸繡眼鳥是雜食性的但是尤其喜愛食用植物的果實。

sentences.english: While the oil is cooling mix your methanol and NaOH(lye) to form the methoxide.
sentences.chinese: 當食用油冷卻時，先將甲醇和氫氧化鈉。

sentences.english: The absorbing amount of nutriment and laminarin from kelp by eating directly by humankind is very little.
sentences.chinese: 人直接食用海帶攝取的營養物質和海帶多糖的量極少。

sentences.english: Make sure that fish or other seafood are wrapped and use as soon as possible.
sentences.chinese: 切記魚或其他海鮮要包裝好，並且儘快食用。

sentences.english: The Russian Oyster Mushroom is an edible variety that belongs to she Shimeji family.
sentences.chinese: 蘇聯平菇屬於姬菇科中可食用的一種。

sentences.english: Food grade polished aluminium cubes to be frozen and used in drinks as ice cubes.
sentences.chinese: 用食用色素處理過的凍鋁塊放到飲料裏當冰塊。

sentences.english: A liquid stationary culture method is applied to culture mushroom in semicontinuous culture system.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹了一種用於食用菌培養的液體靜置培養方法。

sentences.english: The kernel of the walnut is eaten by itself or used in cakes or cookies.
sentences.chinese: 胡桃仁可以直接食用或者用與蛋糕或餅乾中。

sentences.english: The Sargassum fusiforme setchell is rich in nutrition and has high value for food and medical purposes.
sentences.chinese: 羊棲菜營養豐富，食用及藥用價值高。

sentences.english: Switch to whole-wheat couscous and pasta
sentences.chinese: 轉變去食用全麥製作的粗麥粉和通心粉。

sentences.english: Every summer, mother puts up a large quantity of vegetables for us to eat during the winter.
sentences.chinese: 每年夏天母親都要醃大量鹹菜到冬天食用。

sentences.english: The edible-nest swiftlet has its home on a cliff.
sentences.chinese: 食用燕窩燕窩懸崖上有它的家。

sentences.english: The best beef is obtained from steers and heifers (female cows that have not calved ).
sentences.chinese: 最好的牛肉來自食用牛和小母牛。

sentences.english: The dish is usually served with a rich onion gravy.
sentences.chinese: 這道菜通常都和濃郁的洋蔥肉汁一起食用。

definition: way of eating/how something is eaten/how a dish is prepared/the way a dish is to be cooked
